record.dc:title: 131MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 37MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 37MG31 - Earth mound. Features 38C and 39C, Level E. Ramp connecting 2 pyramidal earthworks, Features 38 and 39. Crudely made steps appear on the ramps. Direction southwest.
record.wpa:narrative: [Feature 38C] This ramp is very short, serving only to connect Feat. 39 with Feat. 38 mounds. It has a total rise of Ca. 2.5' and an angle of incline of Ca. 45 degrees. The surface is of hard packed clay and has been crudely cut out to form steps. Feat. 40 lies over a section at the North edge. [Feature 39C] Same as Feature 38C.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations on file at the institution. See also photographs 93MG31 [fhm01208], and 107MG31 [fhm01221].
